security_audit.summary: Legitimate OCR document processing skill using Claude vision. Static findings are false positives triggered by benign patterns in documentation (file paths, directory names, shell examples). The skill only uses system Read/Write tools, makes no network calls, and uses Task agents for context isolation. No malicious intent detected.

content.user_title: Convert PDF and Images to Markdown
content.value_statement: Extracting text from PDF documents and images requires multiple steps and tools. This skill uses Claude vision to accurately convert scanned documents and images into clean markdown format with proper structure preserved.
actual_capabilities: Convert PDF documents to markdown format
Process image files to editable text
Batch process multiple PDF and image files in parallel
Preserve document structure including tables and headings
Save as unified file or page-by-page
limitations: Does not handle password-protected or encrypted PDF files
Cannot process files exceeding Claude vision size limits
Complex layouts may require manual verification
Does not support audio or video file OCR

use_cases.title: Convert Research Papers
use_cases.description: Extract text from academic papers for citation and analysis work.

use_cases.title: Digitize Documents
use_cases.description: Convert scanned contracts and forms into searchable text files.

use_cases.title: Extract Image Text
use_cases.description: Pull text from screenshots for documentation and blog posts.

output_examples.input: Convert this scanned quarterly report to markdown
output: Content types detected: Tables, headings, bullet lists, images

output_examples.input: Extract only the code snippets from this screenshot

output: Output files saved to original folder

best_practices: Use clear custom instructions to focus extraction on specific content
For large documents, verify complex tables render correctly
Keep original files as reference when processing complex layouts
anti_patterns: Do not assume OCR perfectly preserves complex formatting
Do not process sensitive documents without verifying output accuracy
Do not use for password-protected or encrypted PDF files

faq.question: What file sizes are supported?
faq.answer: Files must be under Claude vision limits. Large PDFs may trigger 413 errors.

faq.question: Does this work with scanned PDFs?
faq.answer: Yes, scanned PDFs with images are processed using Claude vision.

faq.question: Can it extract handwritten text?
faq.answer: Handwriting accuracy varies. Simple, clear handwriting works best.

faq.question: How are complex tables handled?
faq.answer: Tables convert to markdown format. Very complex layouts may need manual review.

faq.question: Is my data sent externally?
faq.answer: Processing uses Claude vision only. No data sent to third-party services.

faq.question: Unified vs page-by-page output?
faq.answer: Unified combines all pages into one file. Page-by-page creates separate files.
